verses.name: Zechariah 8:4
verses.text: Thus saith the Lord of hosts; There shall yet old men and old women dwell in the streets of Jerusalem, and every man with his staff in his hand for very age.

verses.name: Zechariah 8:5
verses.text: And the streets of the city shall be full of boys and girls playing in the streets thereof.

verses.name: Zechariah 8:6
verses.text: Thus saith the Lord of hosts; If it be marvellous in the eyes of the remnant of this people in these days, should it also be marvellous in mine eyes? saith the Lord of hosts.
